title: Drawing, Plan and Elevation for Triangular Corner Cabinet, 1900–05
title_raw: Plan and Elevation for Triangular Corner Cabinet
medium: Pen and black ink on thin cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, upper right of elevation: BACK LINED WITH VELVET; below, left of elevation: INCH SCALE
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Elevation (upper segment of sheet): cabinet front with molded top and glass door panel; 4 inside shelves hold pieces of china; raised atop 3 tapering legs.  Plan (bottom segment of sheet): triangular silhouette of cabinet with canted corners.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Plan and Elevation for Triangular Corner Cabinet, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-222.
